segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she looks while the kitchen is flooding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall if he keeps stretching like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the water already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be a disaster if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t understand how she can be so unaware of everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
